old: <KC ATTACK1>後、少し遅らせて<KC ATTACK1>を連続して押す
new:
After <KC ATTACK1>, delay a moment then
repeatedly press <KC ATTACK1>.
Hold <KC ATTACK2> for a moment then release.
Hold <KC ATTACK2> for a moment then release.
While in the air, press <KC ATTACK1>.
While in the air, press <KC ATTACK2>.

old: 敵の攻撃を引きつけて<KC WEAPON_SUB>を押す
new:
Just as an enemy attacks,
press <KC WEAPON_SUB>.

old: 吹き飛ばされ中に<KC JUMP>を押す
new: While being knocked away, press <KC JUMP>.

old: しがみつき中に<KC ATTACK1>を押す
new:
While climbing an enemy,
press <KC ATTACK1>.
